title: # 432 - Pauly Shore & ME
description:
Today I talk to Actor/Comedian Pauly Shore. We talk about Pauly growing up on the sunset strip, The Comedy Store, Mitzi Shore, what fame was like in the 90’s, MTV spring break, and much more! 

Check out Pauly’s new movie “Guest House” on iTunes, Amazon Prime, or Google Play!

This episode is brought to you by Raycon. Get 15% off your order at https://www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Policy Genius Life. Get started today at https://www.policygenius.com
